title: cant join to game
body: Anyone have a problem to join now to game in eu ne?

replies.body: Our network team is still investigating this, but ranked has been disabled in the meantime.  The [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) page has been updated to reflect the current issue.
Still the same problem. Maybe worst...
I haven't seen any other reports on this.  Are you getting any errors?  Toss me some more info, maybe I can help!
queue's froze when you accept them had to close the client 3 times, ppl cant lock in champions in lobby im in q 40 minutes now

Me and a friend cant join either. 5 times someone left the selection. 6 times someone didnt accept the match. or so i thought.
then in one champion selection it showed that one player didnt pick and when the timer hit 0 nothing happened. it stayed there frozen and didnt throw us out of the champ selection. Then we tryed finding another game and after several accepts to found matches that didnt get to selection, it froze on waiting for other players to accept. Didnt do anything for a minute. Then dumped us back to lobby saying my premade declined the match (which he did not). Btw me and my friend are seeing the exact same things and bugs.

This seems to be an EUNE only thing, me and a friend are getting 10+ accept buttons, which are immediatly declined. It also makes us decline the queue when we click accept sometimes. As it stands the game is virtually unplayable.
Your new client only brought more errors/bugs and that shitty error we restored installation to prev version shif.LIKE WHY WOULD YE EVER RESTORE MY PATCH WTF
3 of us. we cant play, the client is bugged af
Are things looking stable now?
you've disabled ranked queues not that we can play normals the client is bugged
We don't have visibility over EU issues, but I'm doing my best to get info out to you guys and getting regular pulse checks for recovery.

http://prntscr.com/gqi5hn
This is a screen of the issue, accept/decline bugs out and you cant click anything in lobby
please inform your programmers this is not a network issue
my guess is that during the patching to the eune server some files were corrupted
all we ask for is updates we appreciate your hard work{{champion:48}}

Hey guys, thanks for the reports here.  I was able to confirm a server issue with EUNE at this moment, but our network team is aware and investigating.  Hang tight for now, and I'll offer updates as they come.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wlfn29W2,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-09-27T19:34:34.866+0000)
>
> Hey guys, thanks for the reports here.  I was able to confirm a server issue with EUNE at this moment, but our network team is aware and investigating.  Hang tight for now, and I'll offer updates as they come.

I hope it won't become like the Replay issue because that issue has been an issue for like 2 months now? Are you aware of this issue just like the Replay one?
Can u at least, turn off punishment for dodging queue. I just got blocked for 30min and i didn't even saw the acceptance button
samewise here. i got a warning for dodging even though i pressed the accept button every time. client wont enter champ select.
ANY RIOTER PLEASE SOMETHING DO WE QUEUE UP OR WHAT???

well RIot...u should really work on solution , or give this issue to actual people that know what to do and how to deal with it...EUNE is only server with this problems for several days now...so is people working on this particular server bad in they job...or YOu RIoT focus just on worlds and how to grab money , not respecting others players what so ever...
U cant even play Aram or Normal game...and when u say idk what is going on in EUNE that tells me u are bad company...like u don't work together...wake up , earn your nice salary
Yea, unable confirm game mode or accept or ban depens on badluck, unable to ban/pick is worst. Klient just freezed ....
I cant join to game to. And i had a punishment for leaver buster because the ''match found'' was bugged in front of my screen. Declines all the time. There's a super bug Riot. A SUPER bug.
I lost 3lp for no reason
Same problem here. last night and same today
Guys are you fixing it? we cant play , please anwer :(

Ranked issues are not the issue, the bloody patch is the issue. The only thing that people can play now is Aram, at this point you might aswell just disable the client and do a full repair on the patch.
Are u for real....the game is bugging out like crazy and yet ure asking if anyone else has a problem xd...halpp us
I just lost my series because i cant ban a champ after the i accepted the match :DDD nice! tnx!
You welcome {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
We tried to play as a 5 man, and 1 of us always doesn't start queue and another one is stuck in queue permanently therefore making him have to restart the client. There is definitely a problem here

I can not believe this, a multi millionaire company who isn't capable to make one proper patch without any bugs,the replay system bugged for 2 months ,not working,i'm getting leave busters because of you , not my fault and i get punished for your faults , not mine,so dear Riot please,fix this asap and be careful with your patching nothing else , is it that hard?{{champion:6}}

> [{quoted}](name=Tmx1991,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wlfn29W2,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-09-27T18:17:48.587+0000)
>
> Anyone have a problem to join now to game in eu ne?

yes
same problem here, aways find game but dont connect and if connect i cant ban champ
Same here.There is definitely a problem.
I have the same problem here,i have accepted and it says I havent every time,when i have got into a game after 20 minutes,i couldnt ban and continue to play.

wtf. is this a joke or something. my Clint is filled with bugs. it took for ever to update. after the update was complete i tried opining the client and it was freezing and lagging. after i finally interned my client was filled with thousands of bugs. i kept trying to start a game but i couldnt. i first tried with a friend. every time they told me that my friend declined for more than 10 times. and when i asked him he said that he never declined. i can see that because he was chatting with me as i was accepting the match he restarted his client for more than three times. then i decided to play alone. i started a game. and when i was searching for game in my forth minute my friend interned without me inviting him, the funny part is that the time was still running. i tried declining, but i couldnt. the clinet want responding. i exited the client. i restarted my hole pc, and i tried again and again but untill now the f-ing Clint is filled with bugs. i also noticed that i want the only one, and it only happened for eu ne. **WHY?????**

I have pretty close problem. I pick 5v5 Summoners Rift --> Blind Pick and I press Find Match.
Next after 3 seconds I get a notification "Match Found" I press Accept but nothing works it's says that I accepted but nobody else did.
It Expires and says A Player had Declined a Ready Check. then that happens for 1 minute over and over and then the whole Client bugs out.
it doesn't let me quit the queue or accept a match.
Any help? PLSSSS

The ONLY Gamemode that is working is ARAM 5V5 RANDOM.
So the replays notification went off that means you solved the issue but went on leaving the game in a situation that you cant even get into a game and your whole client crushes.
Same here, can't join matches, many bugs with the lobby and accepting matches.

After 10 minutes of relogging in to client and accepting matches in queue, i finally joined a match and i asked the players if they had problems too, they said yes and some of them couldn't even lock in.
Do we have anything new about eune server being down ???

I got this problem too... lobby doesn not work and if it does the champ select is broken. As far as i know many rioters says its problem with our internet providers, but tell me how is it possible that 10 000 players has the same problem. Its RIOT´s fault not ours and they havent fixed ****. However the store is avalible 110% of the time so feel free to buy skins to the game that does not work ;)

accept q and doesnt change to champ select.. people cant ban or select their champ.. frozen screen then all comes back.. when someone doesnt select champ it doesnt return to lobby and when it does it says you have missed the q

The  same problem here. More then 13 hours from first report. Ranked queue is active now and **I lost lp** because I can't lock in. 
{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

I have i poroblem... same :
queue's froze when you accept them had to close the client 3 times, ppl cant lock in champions in lobby im in q 40 minutes now
are you even working on it? ir you dont know what to do?
thanks for dodge timer! love u too. fix ur problems

I posted a comment around 3 hours ago, but the issue persists for me. 
In fact, I can't even enter queue anymore.

It is getting worse minute after minnute. At the begining (around 1h eago) I experienced some odd client behaviours but it was menagable. Now i cant even load my home page.

It seems to be some sort of programming issue aswell as possible conectivity issue. For example, game is now unable to close properly. I have to manually kill the process from task manager.
me too

i dont know what ull do just dont give me a penalty for queue dodging because i was unaware of this being a problem for others too. and no i am not capitalizing on this fact to just dodge games as i like. its a real problem for me too.
